sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-home',
  templateUrl: './home.page.html',
  styleUrls: ['./home.page.scss'],
})
export class HomePage implements OnInit {

  constructor() { }

  ngOnInit() {
    return 0
  }

}
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>Academusoft</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
  <ion-header collapse="condense">
    <ion-toolbar>
      <ion-title size="large">Academusoft</ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
  </ion-header>



  <ion-button expand="block" color="primary" routerLink="/register">Registrarse</ion-button>
  <ion-button expand="block" color="secondary" routerLink="/login">Iniciar Sesión</ion-button>

  <ion-footer>
    <ion-toolbar>
      <ion-segment>
        <ion-segment-button value="home" checked>
          <ion-label>Inicio</ion-label>
        </ion-segment-button>
        <ion-segment-button value="courses">
          <ion-label>Cursos</ion-label>
        </ion-segment-button>
        <ion-segment-button value="students">
          <ion-label>Estudiantes</ion-label>
        </ion-segment-button>
        <ion-segment-button value="grades">
          <ion-label>Calificaciones</ion-label>
        </ion-segment-button>
      </ion-segment>
    </ion-toolbar>
  </ion-footer>
</ion-content>
